How To Open Source

A hands-on workshp with Rackspace developers on Berkeley's campus.

Hosted by Hack Berkeley

5. April, 2012

How to Open Source: In this workshop we will contribute in real time to a widely-used Open Source project while explaining best practices. Attendees will then hack on patches themselves with help from in-person and remote open source contributors.

Why Open Source?

  • To improve software that makes a difference to other people
  • To become better software developers and collaborators
  • To document one's abilities for potential employers

See you there!

  • April 2nd
  • 7 - 8:30pm
  • UC Berkeley Soda Hall
  • Pizza provided
